# Base Scanner - Agent Integration

Base Scanner monitors the Base network for newly deployed contracts in real-time and provides instant token analysis.

## API Endpoints

### GET /api/contracts/recent
Returns the 100 most recently discovered contracts on Base.

Response:
```json
{
  "contracts": [
    {
      "address": "0x...",
      "deployer": "0x...",
      "blockNumber": 12345678,
      "timestamp": 1707321600,
      "type": "token" | "nft" | "unknown",
      "name": "Token Name",
      "symbol": "TKN",
      "score": 85
    }
  ],
  "lastBlock": 12345678
}
```

### GET /api/token/[address]
Get comprehensive token information for any ERC20 contract.

Example: GET /api/token/0x833589fCD6eDb6E08f4c7C32D4f71b54bdA02913

Response:
```json
{
  "address": "0x...",
  "name": "USD Coin",
  "symbol": "USDC",
  "decimals": 6,
  "totalSupply": "70000000000000000",
  "price": "1.00",
  "liquidity": 616007.96,
  "volume24h": 28405.94,
  "priceChange24h": "0.01",
  "dex": "aerodrome",
  "pair": "USDC/USDbC",
  "chartUrl": "https://dexscreener.com/base/0x...",
  "basescanUrl": "https://basescan.org/address/0x..."
}
```

## Use Cases

### Opportunity Discovery
Poll /api/contracts/recent every 10-30 seconds to discover new token launches, NFT collections, and contracts as they deploy.

### Token Analysis
When a new token is discovered, call /api/token/[address] to get:
- Price and liquidity data
- Trading volume
- DEX information
- Direct links to charts and explorers

### Scoring
Each contract includes an "interestingness score" (0-100) based on:
- Liquidity depth
- Trading volume
- Contract verification
- Deployer reputation (future)

### Integration Example
```javascript
// Poll for new contracts
setInterval(async () => {
  const res = await fetch('https://base-scanner.vercel.app/api/contracts/recent');
  const { contracts } = await res.json();
  
  // Filter high-score tokens
  const interesting = contracts.filter(c => c.type === 'token' && c.score > 70);
  
  // Analyze each
  for (const contract of interesting) {
    const info = await fetch(`https://base-scanner.vercel.app/api/token/${contract.address}`);
    const data = await info.json();
    
    if (data.liquidity > 10000 && data.volume24h > 5000) {
      // High liquidity + volume = worth investigating
      console.log('Found interesting token:', data);
    }
  }
}, 30000); // Every 30 seconds
```

## Rate Limits
- No authentication required
- Reasonable usage: ~2-4 requests/minute
- For high-frequency needs, consider caching responses

## Network
- Chain: Base (8453)
- RPC: https://mainnet.base.org
- Explorer: https://basescan.org
